About-me.Description1: I'm a student in computer science but also, i'm a full-stack developer, specializing in both web and mobile, with a certain sensitivity to UX and UI.
About-me.Description2: I'm passionate about everything that touches new technologies. I love to discover and use these discoveries on different projects

My-Projects.Area: This is a reaction action project with APIs. The project was elected best project in the class
My-Projects.ViePest: This website was created by myself during an internship and continues to be improved as a freelancer. The site is linked to a strapi back office.
My-Projects.Freshen: This project is my innovative project of end Epitech it is to return for 2024 and has for goal to value the world of the second hand
My-Projects.CloudApp: This is a simple weather application connected to the open weather api
My-Projects.Applelike: This is a totally responsive and simple reproduction of the apple site
My-Projects.ApiBackoffice: Api back office are two projects both a front and a back which is a rest api. on this project you will be able to create articles and with jsonwebtoken authentication system all that connected to a Postgresql database
My-Projects.Orcana: Orcana is a graphql api of an administrator panel it aims to assign roles, to have statistics on users and many other additions

Career-Path.Epitech: Diploma of expert of informatic system
Career-Path.Description0: Improvement of a web project with the reproduction of models and SEO optimization
Career-Path.Description1: Created a web project alone in Nextjs using Tailwind for the CSS and linked it to Strapi as a back office. Creating continuous testing with playwright and deploying with heroku
Career-Path.Description2: CSS correction on different websites and Creation of a specification of a website.
Career-Path.Description3: Continuous integration in agile Scrum methodology of a back and a front from a model. The front is based on React js and CSS and the back is in python with a SQL database hosted on amazon AWS.
